definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to pervade/to fill the air/diffuse/everywhere present/about to inundate (water)/permeated by (smoke)/filled with (dust)/to saturate (the air with fog, smoke etc)
variant of 彌漫|弥漫[mi2 man4]
to pervade/to fill the air/diffuse/everywhere present/about to inundate (water)/permeated by (smoke)/filled with (dust)/to saturate (the air with fog, smoke etc)
variant of 彌漫|弥漫[mi2 man4]
to travel around/to roam/(mobile telephony) roaming
lit. to fill the whole sky/everywhere/as far as the eye can see

sentences.english: Well, Translucency is one of those phenomenon that goes a bit beyond your everyday Lambertian diffuse.
sentences.chinese: 那么，这些现象是半透明多少超越你天天朗伯漫。

sentences.english: Water inched its way up the steps as first as first-floor outside walls collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 当一楼外墙塌陷时水慢慢地沿着台阶漫了上来。

sentences.english: And looking down, he found the valley immersed in thin fog, seeming bottomless.
sentences.chinese: 向下望去，只见深谷中云雾渳漫，兀自不见尽头。

sentences.english: A boat that wanders aimlessly never reaches the shore.
sentences.chinese: 一艘漫无目地游荡的船永远也到不了彼岸。

sentences.english: Let happiness "Snow" diffuse your heart, let the beautiful "Snow" dance beside.
sentences.chinese: 让幸福“雪”漫你心，让美好“雪”舞身旁。

sentences.english: Iall think of you every step of the way.
sentences.chinese: 我会念你，正在漫芜杂道的每一步。

sentences.english: We tossed a coin and it came down heads .
sentences.chinese: 我们把硬币一掷，落下后是漫面朝上。

sentences.english: Alone, I hurriedly followed an ancient path in farmlands to escape from the wilds.
sentences.chinese: 我便独自沿着田间一条荒废了古道，漫乱穿野而行。

sentences.english: Feeling our pockets we were shy. Poor students could not afford it.
sentences.chinese: 摸摸钱包，颇觉羞涩，漫办法，穷学生坐不起。

sentences.english: The water started sloshing over the boat and it began to fill with water.
sentences.chinese: 水开始晃动他们的船并且漫了进来。

sentences.english: This firm Hui Lin Toy Fair continues to participate in the determination of the Third Man.
sentences.chinese: 此举坚定了晖林玩具继续参加第三届漫博会的决心。

definition: to reflect (light)/to shine/to project (an image onto a screen etc)
long or drawn out/remote in time or space/leisurely/to swing/pensive/worried
dawn/daybreak/to know/to let sb know/to make explicit
to feel attached to/to long for/to love
surname Mo/abbr. for 墨西哥[Mo4 xi1 ge1], Mexico
ink stick/China ink/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/corporal punishment consisting of tattooing characters on the victim's forehead
